keyMoments.title: Straw Hat Pirates Enter the New World
keyMoments.description: The entire crew officially enters the New World together, marking a major milestone in their journey. They witness the dangerous red seas and turbulent conditions that characterize the strongest sea in the world.
keyMoments.significance: This is the culmination of the crew's journey through the first half of the Grand Line and represents their readiness to compete with the world's strongest pirates for the title of Pirate King.

keyMoments.title: Crew Faces White Strom Danger
keyMoments.description: The crew works together to survive being caught in the White Strom, demonstrating their enhanced coordination and abilities after the two-year timeskip.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's improved teamwork and individual capabilities, proving they are ready for New World challenges.

keyMoments.title: Crew Saved by Island Whales
keyMoments.description: Through Brook's connection to the Island Whales via Binks' Sake, the entire crew is safely delivered to the surface of the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how the crew's diverse abilities and backgrounds can save them in unexpected ways.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
